help-file.title: USE WANDS STAFF STAVES
help-file.content:
Syntax: use <staff> use <wand> <target>
In order to invoke a wand or staff, you must first hold it in your hand, then employ the "use" command. Using a staff will automatically target everyone and everything in the room except yourself. A wand, on the other hand, must be pointed at a target in order for you to use it. Because wands and staves are magical items, they will not be effective if used in a "No Magic" room.
